fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check paperwork at night, or imitate checked paperwork.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Rebel Flag, you do not need to re-check paperwork.
- You can visit dead bodies to check their paperwork.
- You cannot read stoned, cleaned, or roleblockers who were stabbed by a Serial Killer they visited.
- Once you have checked a body’s paperwork, you can use that ability.
- Using the ability will appear as you visiting the target, while checking the paperwork visits the body.
- You inherit the defense value of the bodies who’s ability you use.
- You need to re-check that body’s paperwork before using it again.
- You can check the paperwork of the same bodies the Retributionist or Necromancer can use.
- You cannot be risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist.
